articles.author: Carter Johnson, Matthew Burgess
articles.title: Global Markets Stable as US Pushes to Contain Middle East War - Bloomberg
articles.description: Demand for haven assets waned as the trading week began in Asia with the US and its allies attempting to contain the Israel-Hamas war. The New Zealand dollar advanced after voters elected a new government.
